dialogue.text: Hi! Are you looking for today’s promotions?
dialogue.en: Hi! Are you looking for today’s promotions?
dialogue.zh: 你好，你在找今天的促銷嗎？
dialogue.ja: こんにちは。本日の特売をお探しですか？

dialogue.text: Our weekly deals are on the yellow tags.
dialogue.en: Our weekly deals are on the yellow tags.
dialogue.zh: 本週特價在黃色標籤上。
dialogue.ja: 週替わり特売は黄色い札です。

dialogue.text: This item is buy one, get one half off.
dialogue.en: This item is buy one, get one half off.
dialogue.ja: こちらは2点目が半額です。

dialogue.text: The discount applies when you scan both items together.
dialogue.en: The discount applies when you scan both items together.
dialogue.zh: 兩件一起結帳掃碼才會折扣。
dialogue.ja: 2点一緒にスキャンすると割引になります。

dialogue.text: There’s also a limited-time coupon in the app.
dialogue.en: There’s also a limited-time coupon in the app.
dialogue.zh: APP 裡也有期間限定優惠券。
dialogue.ja: アプリに期間限定クーポンもあります。

dialogue.text: Do you want me to show you where to activate it?
dialogue.en: Do you want me to show you where to activate it?
dialogue.ja: 有効化の方法をご案内しましょうか？

dialogue.text: This price is valid until 9 PM tonight.
dialogue.en: This price is valid until 9 PM tonight.
dialogue.zh: 這個價格到今晚 9 點為止。
dialogue.ja: この価格は今夜9時まで有効です。

dialogue.text: Some promotions have a limit per customer.
dialogue.en: Some promotions have a limit per customer.
dialogue.ja: 特売には購入制限があるものもあります。

dialogue.text: The limit is two per person for this one.
dialogue.en: The limit is two per person for this one.
dialogue.ja: こちらはお一人様2点までです。

dialogue.text: If you need more, you can ask staff about special orders.
dialogue.en: If you need more, you can ask staff about special orders.
dialogue.zh: 如果需要更多，可以問店員是否能特別訂購。
dialogue.ja: もっと必要なら、取り寄せをスタッフに相談できます。

dialogue.text: Would you like a suggestion for a similar item on sale?
dialogue.en: Would you like a suggestion for a similar item on sale?
dialogue.zh: 要不要我推薦一個也在特價的替代品？
dialogue.ja: セール中の類似商品をおすすめしましょうか？

dialogue.text: This brand is on a better discount today.
dialogue.en: This brand is on a better discount today.
dialogue.zh: 這個牌子今天折扣更好。
dialogue.ja: 今日はこのブランドの割引が大きいです。

dialogue.text: Check the end-of-aisle display—more deals are there.
dialogue.en: Check the end-of-aisle display—more deals are there.
dialogue.zh: 走道口的陳列架還有更多特價。
dialogue.ja: 通路端の特設棚にもお得商品があります。

dialogue.text: If the tag doesn’t match the register, we can fix it at customer service.
dialogue.en: If the tag doesn’t match the register, we can fix it at customer service.
dialogue.zh: 如果標價跟結帳不符，服務台可以處理。
dialogue.ja: 札の価格とレジが違ったら、サービスカウンターで対応します。

dialogue.text: Happy saving—let me know if you want more deals.
dialogue.en: Happy saving—let me know if you want more deals.
dialogue.zh: 祝你買得划算，需要更多特價我可以再找。
dialogue.ja: お得にお買い物を。もっと特売が必要ならお声がけください。
